short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rent GPU & CPU Power And Start Earning

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The first ever browser extension-based GPU and CPU lending and renting platform. 

Inspired by the success of outperforming DeFi tokens such as $GPU, and catering to the popularity and needs for AI, the team behind $GPUBot has developed a Telegram-based platform offering Nodes-as-a-Service and Servers-as-a-Service. With just a few clicks in our proprietary Telegram DApp, you can buy and manage Nodes or Services with an extensive range of options/configurations. Moreover, we utilize a revenue sharing program in which all revenues generated by our platform are distributed to holders. With our offering, we play into the recent momentum of two key aspects in DeFi - Decentralized Physical Infrastructure Networks and Telegram-based tools, both of which will be touched upon in the next paragraphs.
